alert.note: Alert for Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 2:50PM CDT until March 26 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SABINE PARISH... At 249 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Hornbeck, or 15 miles northwest of Anacoco, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Many, Florien, Fisher, Columbus, Negreet and Mount Carmel. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for northwestern Louisiana...and eastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
